title: (x) poketo.com logo and navigation - VAG Rounded, Platelet {Sebastian, Pieter}
content:
Subhead appears to be Georgia bold italic, but I was wondering what the Headline and Navigation fonts were

comments.content:
poketo is platelet by emigre.  
Pieter
